item.title: Magnum Opus of Sanskrit
item.description: Source: pdf 01. Introduction – Importance of Pāṇini The अष्टाध्यायी of पाणिनि (5th century B.C.) is the most refined and sophisticated grammar of all the ancient and modern languages of the world 12345. Accepting its importance even the western scholars have called it in express terms ‘one of the greatest monuments of human intelligence’ 6, ‘a wonderful specimen of human intelligence’ 7, ‘a notable manifestation of human intelligence’ 8, ‘one of the greatest productions of the human mind’ 9 and ‘an important invention of human intelligence’ 1011.
